SENT.plain: Pfeiffer syndrome is one of a group of craniosynostosis syndromes in which rare tracheal anomalies have been described
This group of patients have a poor prognosis, and mortality can be related to airway complications and respiratory distress
We report a case of type II Pfeiffer syndrome with tracheal cartilaginous sleeve and cricoid cartilage involvement
We discuss our strategy for the management of the airway of this patient
